MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G1 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in London Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:08pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at Glasgow Cross substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:45pm on 17th November 2020.
